## CreateStoreReturnType type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type CreateStoreReturnType<State extends StateOption, Getters extends GettersOption<State>, Mutations extends MutationsOption<State>> = {
    state: StateReturnType<State>;
    getters: GettersReturnType<Getters>;
    mutations: MutationsReturnType<Mutations>;
    subscribe: (subscriber: Subscriber) => void;
    replaceState: (newState: UnwrapRef<StateType<State>>) => void;
};
```
